name: get_amazon_search_results
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yo_amazon_data_scraper.
Tool description: Access all public amazon data like the name of the product, price, reviews,...... Also, search for anything on Amazon, just like the amazon search bar
API description: Fetches Amazon search results for a given query using the Toolbench RapidAPI Key.

searchquery.description: The search term to query on Amazon.
